column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Wait was pretty long but it was a Saturday night and it was a busy place
column2: which is normally a good sign for a restaurant. Â Kind of expensive to pay about $10-$15 for a bowl of noodles
column3: but the noodles and meat were prepared well and were very tasty! I ordered the spicy chicken ramen
column4: not very spicey but it was filling. This place can get pricey fast if you like to add a bunch of extras to your ramen
column5: as each one is at least $1 or more.
